ThingDef.label: hullfoam distributor
ThingDef.description: A pumping station for distributing hullfoam throughout a ship. When a portion of the ship's hull is destroyed in combat, this system will automatically patch the hole with hullfoam.

ThingDef.label: shield generator
ThingDef.description:
A shielding device which projects a momentum repulsor field. Shots can go out, but not in.

Generates heat when it blocks attacks. If no heatsink capacity is available, the shield will be damaged and require repairs.

Ship radiators cannot disperse heat while shields are up. Captains are advised to drop shields once heatsinks are close to capacity, or risk their ships turning into ovens.

ThingDef.Name: ShipHeatConduit
ThingDef.label: thermal conduit
ThingDef.description: A liquid conduit for moving heat around a starship.

ThingDef.Name: ShipHeatsink
ThingDef.label: heatsink
ThingDef.description: A liquid-cooled heatsink for storing excess heat from weapons fire. Slowly bleeds heat into the surrounding room; will not function in vacuum.\n\nHeat capacity: 150

ThingDef.Name: ShipHeatsinkLarge
ThingDef.label: large heatsink
ThingDef.description: A liquid-cooled heatsink for storing excess heat from weapons fire. Slowly bleeds heat into the surrounding room; will not function in vacuum.\n\nHeat capacity: 750

ThingDef.Name: ShipHeatManifold
ThingDef.label: heat manifold
ThingDef.description: A specialized heatsink for storing excess heat from weapons fire. Quickly bleeds heat into the surrounding room; will not function in vacuum.\n\nHeat capacity: 120

ThingDef.Name: ShipPurgePort
ThingDef.label: emergency purge port
ThingDef.description: A system for channeling heat into low-melting-point metals like silver. Ejecting molten silver into space is a costly way to quickly purge stored heat. Shields will be dropped during a purge.

ThingDef.Name: ShipPurgePortLarge
ThingDef.label: large emergency purge port
ThingDef.description: A system for rapidly channeling heat into low-melting-point metals like silver. Ejecting molten silver into space is a costly way to quickly purge stored heat. Shields will be dropped during a purge.

ThingDef.label: cannon turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that rapidly accelerates uranium slugs. Requires ammunition, but costs zero energy and very little heat to fire. Only useful at close range. Can be set to intercept torpedoes rather than firing at the enemy ship.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: autocannon
ThingDef.description: Ship cannon. Best used at short range.

ThingDef.label: large cannon turret
ThingDef.description: A cruiser-class turret that rapidly accelerates uranium slugs. Requires ammunition, but costs zero energy and very little heat to fire. Only useful at close range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: autocannon
ThingDef.description: Autocannon. Best used at short range.

ThingDef.label: artillery turret
ThingDef.description: A capital-class turret that rapidly accelerates a stream of massive uranium slugs. Requires ammunition, but costs zero energy and very little heat to fire. Only useful at close range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: autocannon
ThingDef.description: Autocannon. Best used at short range.

ThingDef.label: laser turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that fires a powerful laser. While it can inflict devastating damage, it is only usable at short range. Can be set to intercept torpedoes rather than firing on the enemy ship.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: laser
ThingDef.description: Laser cannon. Short-ranged but devastating.

ThingDef.label: plasma turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that fires a burst of superheated plasma. This balanced weapon can be used at up to medium range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: plasma
ThingDef.description: Plasma cannon. Medium-range and balanced.

ThingDef.label: railgun turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that accelerates metal slugs to relativistic speeds. Its tracking system excels at striking distant targets, but becomes wildly inaccurate at close range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: railgun
ThingDef.description: Railgun. Best used at long range.

ThingDef.label: large laser turret
ThingDef.description: A cruiser-sized turret that fires a powerful laser. While it can inflict devastating damage, it is only usable at short range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: laser
ThingDef.description: Laser cannon. Short-ranged but devastating.

ThingDef.label: large plasma turret
ThingDef.description: A cruiser-sized turret that fires a burst of superheated plasma. This balanced weapon can be used at up to medium range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: plasma
ThingDef.description: Plasma cannon. Medium-range and balanced.

ThingDef.label: large railgun turret
ThingDef.description: A cruiser-sized turret that accelerates metal slugs to relativistic speeds. Its tracking system excels at striking distant targets, but becomes wildly inaccurate at close range.\n\nWill vent heat to the surrounding room if no heatsink capacity is available.

ThingDef.label: railgun
ThingDef.description: Railgun. Best used at long range.

ThingDef.label: spinal capacitor
ThingDef.description: The first segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Connects to one or more amplifiers, then a barrel.

ThingDef.label: spinal amplifier
ThingDef.description: A middle segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Attach one or more of these to an emitter, then add a barrel to complete the gun.\n\nIncreases base damage by 25%, but also increases power consumption and heat generated by the same percentage.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: laser
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: plasma
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: railgun
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.Name: BaseShipTorpedoWeapon
ThingDef.description: Torpedo launcher. Accurate and devastating against shields, but vulnerable to point-defense lasers.

ThingDef.Name: BaseShipTorpedoBuilding
ThingDef.description: Torpedo tubes that launch all kinds of torpedoes. Highly accurate and devastating against shields, but slow to reach targets and vulnerable to point-defense lasers.
